Introduction
This topic contains information about pre-discharge examinations, including
who is eligible for pre-discharge examination
what the Separation Health Assessment (SHA) covers and its usage
, and
general medical examinations and the SHA
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Examinations in Special Situations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
